ModMetaData.name: LMC081s.小型太阳能板
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 英文原名：[WD] Small Solar Panels A small content mod which adds new 2x2 solar panels that produce up to 425 power. 一个小型化太阳能板，占地2X2，提供425W电力。
ModMetaData.author: Wemd
